patch:
diff --git a/Modules/_asynciomodule.c b/Modules/_asynciomodule.c
index 4b84c1de66b..3375891c0da 100644
--- a/Modules/_asynciomodule.c
+++ b/Modules/_asynciomodule.c
@@ -3493,14 +3493,15 @@ _asyncio__swap_current_task_impl(PyObject *module, PyObject *loop,
                                  PyObject *task)
 /*[clinic end generated code: output=9f88de958df74c7e input=c9c72208d3d38b6c]*/
 {
+    Py_INCREF(task); // Ensure we have a strong reference before swapping
     return swap_current_task(get_asyncio_state(module), loop, task);
 }
 
-
 /*[clinic input]
 _asyncio.current_task
 
-    loop: object = None
+// FIXME: Crash CWE-416: Use After Free
+     loop: object = None
 
 Return a currently executed task.
